data.title: Sarasota County Fair
data.meta_description: Visit the annual Sarasota County Agricultural Fair which is a 10 day event each March and features Rides, Entertainment, Crafts, Horticulture, Science Fair,â€¦
data.text:
Description

Visit the annual Sarasota County Agricultural Fair which is a 10 day event each March and features Rides, Entertainment, Crafts, Horticulture, Science Fair, Livestock and Auction. The benefits of this annual event go to promoting the 4-H and FFA.

Admission Prices:

Adults - Ages 13 + : $9

Senior Citizens (55 and over): $5

Active Military: $5

Children (6 - 12): $5

Children 5 & under: Free

$2.00 Gate Entrance: Mondays 5:00 PM - 10:00 PM ONLY

FREE Parking on the Fairgrounds!

Hours Gates Are Open:

Fridays: 2:00 PM to 11:00 PM

Saturdays: Noon to 11:00 PM

Sundays: Noon to 10:00 PM

Monday - Thursday 5:00 PM to 10:00 PM

Daily Arm Band Specials

MARCH 15 FRIDAY: Ride all mechanical rides for $20.00 plus fair admission from

2 PM - 11 PM. None sold after 10 PM

MARCH 16 SATURDAY: Ride all mechanical rides for $20.00 plus fair admission from Noon - 5:00 PM or All Day for $25.00

MARCH 17 SUNDAY: Ride all mechanical rides for $20.00 plus fair admission from Noon - 5:00 PM or All Day for $25.00

MARCH 18 - 21 / MONDAY - THURSDAY: Ride all mechanical rides for $20.00 plus fair admission from 5 PM - 10 PM. None sold after 9 PM

MARCH 22 FRIDAY: Ride all mechanical rides for $20.00 plus fair admission from

2 PM - 11 PM. None sold after 10 PM

MARCH 23 SATURDAY: Ride all mechanical rides for $20.00 plus fair admission from

Noon - 5:00 PM or All Day for $25.00

MARCH 24 SUNDAY: LAST DAY!!! Ride all mechanical rides for $25.00 plus fair admission ALL DAY - OPEN TO CLOSE!! FROM NOON - 10 PM!!

None sold after 9 PM

Steer Show: Tuesday, March 19 at 6:30 PM Houser Arena

Steer Sale: Friday, March 22 at 7:30 PM Houser Arena

Swine Show: Wednesday, March 20 at 6:00 PM Houser Arena

Swine Sale: Saturday, March 23 at 7:00 PM Houser Arena

Plant Sale: Saturday, March 23 at 1:00 PM Plant Tent

Who

Fun for the whole family.

Cost

Adults - Ages 13 + : $9 Senior Citizens (55 and over): $5 Active Military: $5 Children (6 - 12): $5 Children 5 & under: Free. Check the website for specials!

How

Just show up!

More Info
